summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 49th Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to the south line of Lot 10, Block 11, Laurelhurst Heights Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9525 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
